content: Stepped drill bit TS-BT 5.3 HC ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Inserts- ### FEATURES:Features TS-BT step drill bit – simplifies the task of drilling pilot holes to the correct depth for screw-in threaded studs TS-BT HC step drill bit – efficiently removes steel coatings around the pre-drilled hole for S-BT high-current screw-in threaded studs Applications Drilling pilot holes when fastening S-BT threaded studs for steel Removing coatings when fastening S-BT high-current threaded studs for steel ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Metal Technical Data | Base materials | Metal ### ITEMS- 2348154 - Stepped drill bit TS-BT 5.3 HC - Package Size 1 pc
